title: Augusta County: David H. Evans to Mary Anna Sibert, July 21, 1868
summary: Evans states that Sibert's behavior in meeting Sam Ferror on the road caused him to doubt her love for him for the first time. Her letter, however, reassured him. He reaffirms his love for her, and discusses plans for an upcoming visit.
keywords: Women, Family, Arts/Leisure, American Civil War
